Warning.Title: Detects classes that are not cohesive
Warning.Description: Checks for classes that should be split.
Warning.LongDescription: Checks that all the non-private methods of a class form a single logical component within the class. Where there is no overlap between the methods and fields used between two non-private methods, then the class is not-considered to be cohesive, and this test will fail. Such classes can and should be split into two, or more, classes.
